name: columnValuesMissingCount
description: This schema defines the test ColumnValuesMissingCount. Test the column values missing count to be equal to given number.

parameterDefinition.name: missingCountValue
parameterDefinition.description: No.of missing values to be equal to.

parameterDefinition.name: missingValueMatch
parameterDefinition.description: By default match all null and empty values to be missing. This field allows us to configure additional strings such as N/A, NULL as missing strings as well.
